website_summaries.verdict: Among the Reebok Classics, the Workout Plus upholds the same pleasure and coziness that its terry towel-lined predecessors possessed. Of course, the coveted H-strap accessory would always be present as it offers maximum stability and support.Harnessing all powers of vintage detailing, Reebok has worked out here a stylish silhouette that surpasses all fashion pantheon. Considering its heritage and very friendly price, the Workout Plus is a shoe that sneaker fans should seriously look at.
pros: According to the majority of the Reebok Workout Plus reviews, this kick is a really comfortable shoe
Most users praised the excellent quality of the sneaker
The low-cut design of the sneaker provides freedom of movement for the ankle
Multiple colorways of the shoe are available to choose from
The sneaker can be purchased at a budget-friendly price
The Workout Plus from Reebok is quite light, others reported
cons: A reviewer dislikes the look of the shoe, saying it looked so chunky making the foot look massive
A few users note that the sneaker feels a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best
customer_reviews.text: One of the best trainers reebok sell and on the market. Some people like Stan smiths, nike air maxes etc... As a sneakerhead, I always come back to Reebok Workout. The excellent durable sole and cushioning. Durable leather upper - Warm and protects from the elements unlike all of this fashionable primeknit and flynit shoes. Allows one to be on their feet all day, unlike the other trainers previously mentioned. Subtle branding keeps the trainer lowkey and smart, therefore allowing one to wear the trainer in various settings with various outfits. So nice I would buy them twice. So I rotate pairs on alternate days to prolong the life of the trainer.
customer_reviews.author: VivRichards

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are the best!
customer_reviews.text: My order was placed on the Sunday, and delivered on Tuesday lunch time, less than 46 hours later. This must be my 20th pair of these shoes over a sixteen year period. They are so very comfortable. I haven't worn this pair yet as the weather is still dry. The pair I am wearing now are beginning to leak and let in water. I wear these shoes all the time. They are tough, and will get me through winter, and then I will wear my old ones out in the spring on dry days. I am still using a 6 year old pair for D I Y and gardening! I will order a new pair in about 1 years time!
customer_reviews.author: The man in black

customer_reviews.title: Always rely on the classics
customer_reviews.text: These arrived before the due day, well packed. I have four pairs of these trainers and love the fit and comfort of them. When my local shop stop selling them I checked out Amazon and as always was not disappointed. These trainers are a great all round wear and wash in a regular machine 40 deg every time.
customer_reviews.author: Weebeauj

customer_reviews.title: For back to school
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my thirteen year old son and he is very pleased with them, he says that they are comfortable and he loves the way they look, he didn't want "pastie smashers" ???? And the school uniform policy is fairly strict so they had to be black and only black
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I found these too heavy and uncomfortable not like most modern trainers. Quite disappointing, returned to amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anna and Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but I found that it was actually a lot tighter around the foot so recommended a size up
customer_reviews.author: Nav

customer_reviews.title: you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I disliked because I wear them all the time great trainer

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Ive had 5 pairs from Reebok direct over the past 10 years, but these are extremely narrow compared to what I received off Reebok, therefore I had to return. However, if you have narrow feet then the product is great, brand new at a much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Benson

customer_reviews.title: Best trainer ever made
customer_reviews.text: Always had these trainers,beat them about and still going,one of the best made,i still wear my old pair after 5yrs hence sole worn out,but value for money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: mr h nagar

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these for the last 8 or 9 years allways last a very long time and very commfy

customer_reviews.title: Love these reeboks!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.......
customer_reviews.text: Not for me..... but I buy these every year as a gift. Partner love these you can't beat a pair of reebok. Seller brilliant no complaints "😊

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Trainers.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been buying this trainer for years, he doesn't run or exercise, he likes them for the comfort and they aren't flashy. Very good price on amazon prime.

customer_reviews.title: Old faithfuls.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy them
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy them. I wouldn't buy from this source again. They dont fit. Store bought Classics fit like a glove. These are fake or rejects and are sub-standard.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable trainer. Wish there was more like them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable trainer. Wish there was more like them, even a nice slip on in same style would be nice to see.

customer_reviews.title: Order half size down to normal shoe size (female)
customer_reviews.text: Normally a size 7, ordered 7.5 and fit was huge. 7 was not available to order so reordered in 6.5 which was a perfect fit. Great looking trainer for a decent price.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and comfort from day one. Plain black. Ideal for casual wear. Good value.

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Workout Plus Trainers
product_meta.description: We're reminding sneaker heads why our Workout Plus is so iconic by getting back to basics. The minimally styled upper keeps the focus on the iconic h-strap and all round comfort.
